title: Balancing Your Chakras Meditation
cleaned_text: The Electromagnetic frequency of your brain waves determines the energy of your body. Your emotional feelings are directed from your brain and has a dramatic impact on your heart. Unaware, we believe that all of this is out of our control, but it's not. In fact, it's directly under our control through the power of our thoughts. So, to change your life, you must first change the way you think. The consistent practice of intentionally slowing the desired, proactive thought is called Meditation. Increase your balance your energy centers with this relaxing 12-minute chakra meditation. *Note: This product is an
